alert.note: Alert for Deschutes (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 19 at 3:14PM PDT until May 19 at 3:45PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM PDT FOR NORTHWESTERN DESCHUTES COUNTY... At 313 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles south of McKenzie Pass, or 20 miles west of Bend, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sisters. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
